title: Nola Cherri
subtitle: Live Session
author: Aphelandra Siassia

text.text: For our first X-Track studio session, our guest Nola Cherri honored us with a performance of her song « Omo » taken from her first EP « These Associations ».
Follow Nola Cherri on her socials : @nolacherri/
